GLOBAL.NOT_CONNECTED: Du bass net mam Server verbonn
GLOBAL.INVALID_LINK: Sorry, the link you've opened is invalid.

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.SUCCESS: We sent you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account deletion
REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Are you sure? Your account and your personal data will be permanently deleted. Anything you have done on this platform will be made anonymous. If you confirm, we send you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.

USERDATA.OTHER_PEOPLE_TRUST_YOU: {otherUser} trusts you in {groupName}. | {count} people trust you in {groupName}.
USERDATA.PEOPLE_TRUST_USER: You and {otherUser} trust {userName} in {groupName}. | You and {count} other people trust {userName} in {groupName}.
USERDATA.FIRST_TRUST: Be the first one to trust {userName} in {groupName}!
USERDATA.NEWCOMER_GUIDANCE: {userName} is new to your group and might need some guidance.
USERDATA.TRUST_PROGRESS_TEXT_LONG: {trustNeeded} more people need to express their trust in {userName} to grant editing permissions.
USERDATA.NEWCOMER_INFO: You are currently a newcomer in {groupName} and you can become active by writing messages, meeting fellow members, doing pickups and giving feedback. As soon as {threshold} members expressed their trust in you, you will gain editing permissions to help with group administration.

TRUST_INFO.TITLE: What is this carrot button about?
TRUST_INFO.MESSAGE: It is part of the Karrot trust system. It shows if a group member is newcomer and how much trust is needed until they gain editing permissions.
TRUST_INFO.LINK: Click here to find out more.

VALIDATION.MAXLENGTH: Too long, please use less than {max} characters.
VALIDATION.UNIQUE: Name already exists, please choose another.

weekly_summary.NAME: Weekly summary
weekly_summary.DESCRIPTION: Keep up to date with what's been happening in the group.

daily_pickup_notification.NAME: Pickup notifications
daily_pickup_notification.DESCRIPTION: Reminds you of your pickups, and tells you about empty or not-full pickups of your favorite places in the next day

new_application.NAME: New applications
new_application.DESCRIPTION: Tells you when somebody wants to join your group

conflict_resolution.NAME: New conflict resolution processes
conflict_resolution.DESCRIPTION: Tells you when a new conflict resolution process has been started in your group

GROUP.PLAYGROUND_INFO: This is a playground group, you can't break anything. Explore, click around and have fun!

STOREDETAIL.INACTIVE: This place is currently not cooperating.
STOREDETAIL.CHANGE_STATUS: You can change the status on the settings page.
STOREDETAIL.NO_DESCRIPTION: This place does not have a description yet

STOREEDIT.NAME: Numm
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE: How many weeks in advance should recurring pickup dates be shown?
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE_WARNING: You are about to reduce the number of weeks pickups are shown. Existing leftover pickups will get deleted if nobody has joined them. You can disable all other pickups manually, if needed.

PLACEWALL.SUBSCRIBED_USERS: {count} people have marked this place as favourite

SUBSCRIPTION.HEADER: Do you want to mark this place as your favourite?
SUBSCRIPTION.YES_TEXT: Shows available pickups on the group wall and sends emails about upcoming pickups.
SUBSCRIPTION.NO_TEXT: None of the above. You can still sign up for pickups though.

PICKUPMANAGE.PICKUP_DOES_NOT_MATCH: This pickups' date doesn't match the recurrence pattern

PICKUPDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: Do you really want to delete this recurring pickup date? This will also delete all one-time pickup dates that belong to this recurring pickup date (except where people joined already).

CREATEPICKUP.ENABLE_DISABLE_MESSAGE: Users who joined this pickup will get a notification. You can change this text to provide a reason:
CREATEPICKUP.EXCEPTIONS_MESSAGE: Some upcoming pickups don't match the settings of this recurring pickup. Have a look below at '{upcomingLabel}' to change or disable pickups, if needed.

PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE: There is one pickup in your favorite places waiting for you! | There are {count} pickups in your favorite places waiting for you!
PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE_FEEDBACK: You can give feedback to a pickup | {count} pickups await your feedback
PICKUPLIST.JOINEDNOTICE: You have one upcoming pickup | You have {count} upcoming pickups
PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE_FROM_STORES: This shows pickups from your favorite places in the next days. You can access other places in the sidebar.

ITEM.JOIN_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you have time to pick up on {date}?
ITEM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you really sure the others can do the pickup without you?

PICKUPLIST.NONE_HINT: You can create a new pickup on the place page.
PICKUPLIST.STORE_NONE_HINT: You can create a new pickup on the pickup manage page.

FEEDBACKLIST.SAVED_FOOD: At least 1 kg was saved here. Thank you! | People gave feedback for {amount} kg of saved food already! Keep up the great work!

FEEDBACKLIST.NO_DONE_PICKUPS_HINT: You currently have no pickups to give feedback to. Why not join another pickup?

PICKUP_FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: You can provide feedback for your pickup here
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT: Amount of food you were able to save (in kg)
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT_INFO: For place statistics, we will add together the amount of all feedback.
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER: Was everything fine? Did everyone show up? Your comment here...
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.TOGETHER_WITH: You did this pickup together with:

PASSWORDRESET.TITLE: Password reset
PASSWORDRESET.INTRO: Enter your Email address and we will send you a link to set a new password (if you have an account registered).
PASSWORDRESET.SUCCESS: The request was successfully sent. Have a look at your Emails!

RESET.TITLE: Reset password
RESET.SUCCESS: Your new password has been saved.

CHANGE.SUCCESS: Your new password has been saved.

HISTORY.GROUP_MODIFY: changed the settings of this group

HISTORY.SERIES_MODIFY: changed the settings of a recurring pick-up

NOTIFICATION_BELLS_LIST.NO_ITEMS: We currently don't have notifications for you.

NOTIFICATION_BELLS.CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_CONTINUED: The conflict resolution process with {userName} continues

NOTIFICATION_BELLS.CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_DECIDED: The conflict resolution process with {userName} was decided
NOTIFICATION_BELLS.CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_DECIDED_ABOUT_YOU: The conflict resolution process with you was decided
NOTIFICATION_BELLS.CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_YOU_WERE_REMOVED: You were removed from the group
NOTIFICATION_BELLS.VOTING_ENDS_SOON: Voting ends soon, don't forget to participate!

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.TITLE: Update available
UPDATE_AVAILABLE.DETAIL: A new version of karrot is available.

NOT_FOUND.EXPLANATION: Sorry, we couldn't find this page anywhere.

AGREEMENT.TITLE: Title
AGREEMENT.TITLE_HELPER: Give your agreement a title, e.g. Community Rules
AGREEMENT.MINOR_EDIT_HELPER: Typos, formatting, etc... people will not be asked to re-agree
AGREEMENT.BLURB1: You don't have an agreement yet!
AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can do pickups.

REPLACE.TITLE: Change agreement?
REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for pickups

REMOVE.TITLE: Remove agreement?
REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do a pickup

WALL.VERIFY_EMAIL_FOR_NOTIFICATIONS: Please verify your e-mail address to receive notification e-mails
WALL.RECEIVED_VIA_EMAIL: This message was sent via e-mail

CONVERSATION.UNREAD_MESSAGES: You have one unread message. | You have {count} unread messages.
CONVERSATION.CLOSED: This conversation has been closed automatically.
CONVERSATION.NOT_PARTICIPATED: By sending a message, you will be subscribed to notifications about this conversation.

APPLICATION.GALLERY_TOOLTIP: You applied to join this group. Your application is still pending.
APPLICATION.WALL_NOTICE: There is an application pending! | There are {count} applications pending!
APPLICATION.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to accept {userName} into this group?
APPLICATION.DECLINE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to decline the application of {userName}?
APPLICATION.HELP: This is a chat between all existing members of {groupName} and the new applicant {userName}. It is meant to give you all a chance to get to know you before deciding whether to accept, decline or withdraw the application.

INACTIVITY.WHAT: What does it mean to be inactive?
INACTIVITY.HELP: Everyone who did not log into the group for {dayCount} days or more counts as inactive. These users will not receive notification emails anymore.

CONFLICT.STEPPER1a: You are about to start a group-wide conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER1b: This will involve all members with editing permissions to find the best way to proceed.
CONFLICT.STEPPER2a: Thank you for caring for your community!
CONFLICT.STEPPER2b: It is important to address social issues, although it can be unpleasant sometimes. Thank you for your courage!
CONFLICT.STEPPER3b: This process will start a chat and a vote.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3c: The chat will be visible for members with editing permissions and includes {userName}.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3d: The voting is anonymous. It will go on for {votingDuration} days. During this time all voters can change their minds and vote differently as many times as they want.
CONFLICT.STEPPER4a: Please explain why you are starting this conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER4b: Tell your group what made you think this process is justified and needed. This statement will be visible to {userName} and group members with editing permissions.
CONFLICT.WITH: This process is to resolve a conflict with {userName}

VOTING.HEADLINE: How do you want to proceed with the ongoing conflict with {userName}?

REQUIREMENTS.ACTIVE_EDITORS: Your group has {activeEditorsCount} active users with editing permissions. You need {requiredCount} to start a conflict resolution process.
REQUIREMENTS.NEWCOMER: Before you can start a conflict resolution process, you need to receive more trust and gain editing permissions. In the meantime, please ask a fellow group member to start the process for you.

INFO.TITLE: How does this process work?
INFO.MESSAGE: This is a score voting in which group members with editing permissions can participate to determine how to deal with a social conflict that affects the whole group.

CREATION.TOAST: You successfully started a conflict resolution process

ISSUE.TITLE: Issues
ISSUE.PARTICIPANTS: {count} members have been added to this discussion.

VOTING.FURTHER_DISCUSSION: Further discussion: extend time by starting another voting

RESULTS.KEEP_DISCUSSING: Your group voted to keep discussing
RESULTS.UNDECIDED: Unfortunately this conflict could not be decided.
RESULTS.UNDECIDED_WHY: There are two possible reasons for that:
RESULTS.UNDECIDED_REASON_1: the affected user left the group while the conflict resolution process was still ongoing

UNSUBSCRIBE.FROM_GROUP: Unsubscribe from all email notifications in {groupName}
UNSUBSCRIBE.COUNTS: You unsubscribed from {formerConversations} conversations and {formerReplies} replies.
